languages.text: Спустя дюжину ударов корабельного гонга Лорд-капитану докладывают, что ремонтная бригада пострадала от непреходящей головной боли, вероятнее всего, вызванной давящим магнитным полем мира. Однако механизмы успешно восстановлены, и, если Лорд-капитан того желает, добычу адамантиума можно возобновить. Конечно же при условии, что на мире останется взвод рабочих сервиторов и команда обслуживания, обреченная бесконечно страдать от беспощадных геомагнитных бурь.

traits.locale_text: Спустя дюжину ударов корабельного гонга вам докладывают, что ремонтная бригада неизбежно пострадала от непреходящей головной боли, вероятнее всего, вызванной давящим магнитным полем мира. Однако механизмы успешно восстановлены, и если Лорд-капитан того желает, добычу адамантиума можно возобновить. Конечно же при условии, что на мире останется взвор рабочих сервиторов и команда обслуживания, обреченная бесконечно страдать под эффектом геомагнитных бурь.

languages.text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.
languages.original_text: Спустя дюжину ударов корабельного гонга Лорд-капитану докладывают, что ремонтная бригада пострадала от непреходящей головной боли, вероятнее всего, вызванной давящим магнитным полем мира. Однако механизмы успешно восстановлены, и, если Лорд-капитан того желает, добычу адамантиума можно возобновить. Конечно же при условии, что на мире останется взвод рабочих сервиторов и команда обслуживания, обреченная бесконечно страдать от беспощадных геомагнитных бурь.

traits.locale_text: About a dozen time bells later Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantium may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the pain from the magnetic storms.

However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantium may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the pain from the magnetic storms.

Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

languages.text: 几十次报时之后，领主舰长得知维修人员正不断地遭受头疼折磨，很可能是由于这个世界的强磁场造成的。不过即便如此，采矿器械依然成功修复。如果领主舰长愿意的话，可以立即恢复精金的开采工作。当然，矿山需要配备一队作业机仆与一支维护队伍，这些工人注定将忍受磁暴带来的无尽痛苦。
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

traits.locale_text: 几十次报时之后，领主舰长得知维修人员正不断地遭受头疼折磨，很可能是由于这个世界的强磁场造成的。不过即便如此，采矿器械依然成功修复。如果领主舰长愿意的话，可以立即恢复精金的开采工作。当然，矿山需要配备一队作业奴工与一支维护队伍，这些工人注定将忍受磁暴带来的无尽痛苦。

languages.text: それから数十時間後、ロード・キャプテンは修理クルーが耐え難い頭痛に悩まされていることを知らされる。 おそらく、この惑星の重苦しい磁場が原因だろう。しかし、機械は正常に修復されており、ロード・キャプテンが望むならアダマンチウムの抽出を続行することができる。もちろん鉱山には、サーヴィターの部隊と、磁気嵐による終わりのない痛みに耐えることを運命づけられたメンテナンス部隊を配置する必要がある。
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

traits.locale_text: それから数十時間後、ロード・キャプテンは修理クルーが耐え難い頭痛に悩まされていることを知らされる。 おそらく、この惑星の重苦しい磁場が原因だろう。しかし、機械は正常に修復されており、ロード・キャプテンが望むならアダマンチウムの抽出を続行することができる。もちろん鉱山には、サーヴィターの部隊と、磁気嵐による終わりのない痛みに耐えることを運命づけられたメンテナンス部隊を配置する必要がある。

languages.text: Unas docenas de campanadas después, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán es informad{mf|o|a} de que el equipo de reparación está sufriendo fuertes dolores de cabeza, probablemente causados por el opresivo campo magnético de este mundo. Sin embargo, las máquinas han sido reparadas con éxito, y la extracción de adamantino puede continuar si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán lo desea. Por supuesto, es necesario proveer a la mina de un escuadrón de servidores y una brigada de mantenimiento destinada a soportar los interminables dolores causados por las tormentas magnéticas.
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

traits.locale_text: Unas docenas de campanadas después, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán es informad{mf|o|a} de que el equipo de reparación está sufriendo fuertes dolores de cabeza, probablemente causados por el opresivo campo magnético de este mundo. Sin embargo, las máquinas han sido reparadas con éxito, y la extracción de adamantio puede continuar si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán lo desea. Por supuesto, es necesario proveer a la mina de un escuadrón de servidores y una brigada de mantenimiento destinada a soportar los interminables dolores causados por las tormentas magnéticas.

languages.text: Einige Dutzend Glockenschläge später wird der Lord Captain in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass die Reparaturcrew über gnadenlose Kopfschmerzen klagt, vermutlich durch das starke Magnetfeld dieser Welt ausgelöst. Doch Maschinen wurden jedoch erfolgreich repariert, und die Extraktion von Adamantium kann fortgesetzt werden, wenn der Lord Captain es wünscht. Natürlich muss die Mine mit einem Trupp Arbeitsservitoren und einer Wartungsbrigade bemannt werden. Sie werden dazu verdammt sein, die durch die Magnetstürme ausgelösten Schmerzen ewig zu ertragen.
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantium may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

traits.locale_text: Einige Dutzend Glockenschläge später wird der Lord Captain in Kenntnis gesetzt, dass die Reparaturcrew über gnadenlose Kopfschmerzen klagt, vermutlich durch das starke Magnetfeld dieser Welt ausgelöst. Doch Maschinen wurden jedoch erfolgreich repariert, und die Extraktion von Adamantium kann fortgesetzt werden, wenn der Lord Captain es wünscht. Natürlich muss die Mine mit einem Trupp Arbeitsservitoren und einer Wartungsbrigade bemannt werden. Sie werden dazu verdammt sein, die durch die Magnetstürme ausgelösten Schmerzen ewig zu ertragen.

languages.text: Quelques dizaines de cycles plus tard, on informe {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} que l'équipe chargée des réparations souffre de maux de tête chroniques, très probablement induits par le champ magnétique accablant qui sévit sur la planète. Pour autant, les machines sont de nouveau opérationnelles et l'extraction d'adamantine peut reprendre si telle est la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Bien entendu, l'exploitation de la mine nécessiterait une batterie de servitors ainsi qu'une brigade de maintenance condamnée à subir les affres permanentes des orages magnétiques.
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.

traits.locale_text: Quelques dizaines de cycles plus tard, on informe {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} que l'équipe chargée des réparations souffre de maux de tête chroniques, très probablement induits par le champ magnétique accablant qui sévit sur la planète. Pour autant, les machines sont de nouveau opérationnelles et l'extraction d'adamantium peut reprendre si telle est la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Bien entendu, l'exploitation de la mine nécessiterait une batterie de servitors ainsi qu'une brigade de maintenance condamnée à subir les affres permanentes des orages magnétiques.

languages.text: Zaman çanları onlarca kez çalıyor. Onarım mürettebatının aman vermeyen baş ağrılarından muzdarip olduğu ve bunun da muhtemelen bu gezegenin bunaltıcı manyetik alanı yüzünden kaynaklandığı haberi, Lord Kaptan'a veriliyor. Ne var ki makineler başarıyla onarılmış ve Lord Kaptan arzu ederse adamantin madenciliği devam edebilir. Elbette madende çalışacak bir Hizmetör ekibiyle bu manyetik fırtınaların sebep olduğu durmak bilmeyen acıya katlanmaya mahkûm bir bakım birliğinin kalması şart.
languages.original_text: A few dozen time bells later, the Lord Captain is informed that the repair crew is suffering from unrelenting headaches, most likely caused by the oppressive magnetic field of this world. However, the machines have been successfully repaired, and the extraction of adamantine may continue if the Lord Captain wishes. Of course, the mine needs to be staffed with a squad of working servitors and a maintenance brigade doomed to endure the endless pain caused by the magnetic storms.
